entry.title: Starting up
entry.content: After taking a from my Pi

entry.title: Ordering the Pi
entry.content: On February 29th 2012 early in the German morning, the Raspberry Pi killed both websites taking orders. I was able to register at rs-online.com and express my demand in the Pi. In the mid of May I got an invitation to the exclusive Raspberry Pi shop at RS. Delivery was announced to start on June 7th or later. But: Surprise! On May 31st my Pi was on its way from Birmingham and 25 hours later I had it in my hands. I was happy but it started to get painful. More later…
